resources.string: A layer of truth on every forward.
You read, \'TheShore\' is ready to back you from fake news.
Your time is important. So, Why waste it in reading fake news.
Whole story behind the fake news is just one click ahead.
Enable accessibility on the next screen for TheShore to function smoothly

No Thanks! Take me to the app
Allow Shore Media to draw overlays permission?
You have to enable the draw overlays permission for this app to work.
Allow Shore Media to use accessibility service?
We need accessibility permission to protect you from fake-news in real time.

Switch 'ON' in the top right corner to save time as The Shore unlocks these cool features for you:
- Real time Fake news detections on WhatsApp forwards
- Share real story instead of fake forward

Note:
You may receive a standard warning after this screen. Don't worry about it, The Shore will never collect your personal information. Contact info@nitinsworld.com for any concerns.
Allow Shore Media to run in Battery saving mode?
We need battery optimization permission to run in saving mode.
Look for \'TheShore\' is the list and click
